p: The obtained COOs could be used as innovative and peculiar ingredients for pastry and baking application, thanks to their sweet note, in order to produce high quality foods. This possibility is due to the peculiar sensory properties of these oils, which are able to combine some nutritional qualities (antioxidant capacity, high phenol content, etc.) of the extra-virgin olive oil with the aromatic positive flavour due to the terpenes coming from the citrus peels.
